card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"要说你有多直率，你可是在一个无论是时间流动、还是人心成长上都无不曲折的故事中，也从来没有拐过弯的人呢。但你正是凭借着这份直率，把九“个人”的故事，变成了“九个人”的故事。你更凭借着从未动摇过的心意，把她和你的故事，变成了“两个人”的故事。 \n如果说艺术是无功利的功利性，那么心怀无条件坚定信念的你能够成为主角，本就是自然而然。 \n祝我们的主角·爱城华恋生日快乐！感谢你让我们看到了久违了的火红与炽热的赤子之心。","id":37026124,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":432,"img_size":56.74,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/56ca6242375af21f1aed3619ceeda6379df61e12.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":768},{"img_height":500,"img_size":23.7,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/868bea92039da8ec2f87d2260657d91c5cd8708e.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":333},{"img_height":281,"img_size":20.04,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/0a3189e88ef0397a4caf000054758d1f83ec0a67.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":500},{"img_height":1080,"img_size":238.06,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/628e8f9ecab0ccd264a158fa537eccbbbf41485d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":1080,"img_size":180.83,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/8e68694b4056588c6091c59bdd046a043b6b3ea4.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":300,"img_size":24.46,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/64e5ce2c9ff2884217df14aa1159aff08725a9ee.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":242},{"img_height":719,"img_size":122.14,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/2d58848f4c36c1b2d25eea53fdc84f4e17a6bae0.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1069},{"img_height":159,"img_size":14.72,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/c10588ea116897b2f16158d9c7db5fc6e4e96e2a.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":318},{"img_height":337,"img_size":27.88,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/f59f329bdf750b8745be979ca7a89bed6a5c8a05.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":600}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":142,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1569517533},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
